text: Aleksandër Meksi (born 8 March 1939) is an Albanian politician. He was the 28th Prime Minister of Albania from 13 April 1992 to 11 March 1997. He was a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Albania Category:Archaeologists Category:Politicians from Tirana
title: Aleksandër Meksi
